name: AvantLink Merchant Integration For WooCommerce
author: AvantLink

sections.description:
The AvantLink Integration For WooCommerce plugin allows quick and simple integration of the AvantLink network tracking library into your WooCommerce website.

Users must have a valid, active merchant account with AvantLink to utilize this plugin.

Once activated, merchants can quickly and easily track affiliate sales and attribute commissions through their WooCommerce website.
sections.installation:
1. Activate the plugin through the Plugins menu in WordPress.
  2. You’ll see the Avantlink Logo appear in your Admin Menu; navigate to it.
  3. On that page, input your Merchant ID and hit save. If you’re not sure what your Merchant ID is, contact support@avantlink.com
sections.changelog:
1.0.11

  • Tested up to WordPress version 6.4.1
  • Changed from using order_id to get_order_id from the order

1.0.10

  • tested up to WordPress version 6.3

1.0.9

  • renaming of function to recently added function to be more unique to avoid naming issues.

1.0.8

  • Tested WordPress version 6.2
  • added string escapes to allow html encoding to be read to php output properly

1.0.7

  • Tested WordPress version 6.1

1.0.6

  • Tested WordPress version 6.0.2

1.0.5

  • Tested WordPress version 5.9

1.0.4

  • Tested WordPress version 5.8.1
  • Updated Title and Description

1.0.3

  • Fixed a bug with item amounts being calculated incorrectly for multiple quantities

1.0.2

  • Added protection against a fatal error in edge case with products
  • Tested WordPress version 5.4.1

1.0.1

  • Updated menu link
  • Added logo

1.0.0

  • Initial version
